description:
You’re not just looking for a house. You’re looking for a place for your life to happen. Search for homes near top-rated schools, explore neighborhoods and compare industry-exclusive Zestimate® home values. 
“It’s the most useful tool to find the home of your dreams!!” – ranitarunner

Key Features: 
•	Browse U.S. homes for sale and for rent, plus 1 million+ listings you won’t find on an MLS.
•	Find every type of property: single-family homes, apartments, townhomes, condos and more. 
•	Get pre-approved for a loan and demonstrate that you’re a credible buyer. Qualified buyers will receive an approval letter from a highly-rated lender within minutes.
•	Search three ways: from where you are (via GPS locator); type in an address; or draw a custom region on the map. 
•	Filter searches by price, beds, baths, keywords and more. 
•	Get detailed ratings and reviews on public and private schools in your desired area. Use custom search tools to find homes based on quality of schools and their boundaries. 
•	See the Zestimate of any home in the U.S. and see Rent Zestimates (estimated monthly rental prices), on most homes and apartments. 
•	Only on Zillow: Get FREE access to foreclosure information across the nation. View foreclosure listings in your area, including pre-foreclosures, foreclosure auctions and bank-owned properties. 
•	Save your favorite homes and searches, then view them on Zillow.com or any mobile device.
•	Receive notifications when new listings hit the market, drop in price, show an open house date or are sold.
•	Contact a local agent to tour a home. 
•	Access mortgage calculators, real-time mortgage rates and personalized loan quotes.


For Real Estate Agents:

Sign in as an agent to start using exciting new features, including push notifications to instantly alert you of new contacts and auto-responder for quick and easy follow-up. Plus manage your listings, upload past sales and request client reviews – all from your mobile device.
trackCensoredName: Real Estate by Zillow – Homes & Apartments, For Sale or Rent
trackName: Real Estate by Zillow – Homes & Apartments, For Sale or Rent
releaseNotes:
Thanks for your suggestions and bug reports! You can now see Coming Soon and Make Me Move listings without signing in. Expand your search by checking out homes before they are even listed!

Sign in as an agent to start using the new agent features, including push notifications to instantly alert you of new contacts and auto-responder for quick and easy follow-up. Plus manage your listings, upload past sales, and request client reviews – all from your mobile device.

Please continue to send your feedback to iphonefeedback@zillow.com. We really appreciate it!
